attributes.action: Stop penalising couples who choose not to have children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
During the past few years we have seen couples who choose not to have children penalised more & more by the government.

The marriage allowance was scrapped & it seems that handouts and help to those who choose to help overpopulate our already crowded isles have increased exponentially.

Therefore we humbly suggest that you consider rewarding couples who choose not to have children.
